1. Every file needs to be created after login with his/her own credential

2. Every system user needs to update his own email.
    So, when a file will be activated by admin,
    an automatic email will be sent to the file owner with his file reference number,
    and the folder name

3. email update to get activation code

4. to send email for invoice which email needs to be used // postmaster@huberslaw.co.uk (currently using)
